props.appendIcon: Appends an icon to the component, uses the same syntax as `v-icon`
props.backgroundColor: Changes the background-color of the input
props.dark: Applies the dark theme variant to the component. This will default the components color to _white_ unless you've configured your [application theme](/customization/theme) to **dark** or if you are using the **color** prop on the component. You can find more information on the Material Design documentation for [dark themes](https://material.io/design/color/dark-theme.html).
props.hideDetails: Hides hint and validation errors. When set to `auto` messages will be rendered only if there's a message (hint, error message, counter value etc) to display
props.height: Sets the height of the input
props.label: Sets input label
props.loading: Displays linear progress bar. Can either be a String which specifies which color is applied to the progress bar (any material color or theme color - **primary**, **secondary**, **success**, **info**, **warning**, **error**) or a Boolean which uses the component **color** (set by color prop - if it's supported by the component) or the primary color
props.persistentHint: Forces hint to always be visible
props.prependIcon: Prepends an icon to the component, uses the same syntax as `v-icon`
props.required: Designates the input as required; Adds an asterisk to the end of the label; Does not perform any validation.
props.toggleKeys: Array of key codes that will toggle the input (if it supports toggling)

events.change: Emitted when the input is changed by user interaction
events.click:append: Emitted when appended icon is clicked
events.click:prepend: Emitted when prepended icon is clicked
